description:
This is a market on the Market Cap comparison of two cryptocurrencies: Terra ($LUNA) and Solana ($SOL) for the resolution date and time of March 15, 2022, at 8:00 PM ET. 

The resolution source for this market will be market cap ranking on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en). 

If, according to the resolution source, $LUNA has a greater market cap than $SOL on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “Terra”. If $SOL has a greater market cap than $LUNA on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “Solana”. If the estimated market cap for the resolution date is exactly the same for both cryptocurrencies, this market will resolve 50/50.

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable at the resolution time, another credible source will be checked such as CoinMarketCap. In the event of an ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, historical market caps of each coin will be used (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/terra-luna, https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana), precisely the first recorded measurement after March 15, 8:00 PM ET.


Market Cap = Current Price x Circulating Supply. Refers to the total market value of a cryptocurrency’s circulating supply.

events.title: Which cryptocurrency will have a higher market cap on March 15: Terra ($LUNA) or Solana ($SOL)?

question: Which cryptocurrency will have a higher market cap on March 15: Terra ($LUNA) or Solana ($SOL)?
